page.title: 13MID-SUSSEX EVENTS
page.content: {In May 1985 His Royal Highness {Prince Philip visited Hurstpierpoint} College.He landed in a helicopter on the cricket fields,and later opened the brand new science laboratories which cost about{Â£500,000}.He was taken for a tour of the laboratories,unveiled a plaque and cut the silk ribbon at the entrance. In Lindfield in the summer of '85 a net was thrown across the pond to save the ducks.Swans had been attacking the ducks but now the ducks can escape underneath the net.Last season about 50 ducks were driven away or drowned by the swans.The culprits where Charles and Diana and their 8 cygnets.
